A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Plot holes everywhere\, I was hoping that the next one would be better than the first. If there were not six movies before this it MIGHT have been good. George Lucas is sitting back counting his money and laughing. Disney needs to hire some of the YouTube channels to fact check every plot hole and Capt Phasma under utilized\, Rey’s parents were nobody\, Snoke looked so powerful but weak\, Luke’s part was lame.
